title: Agentic AI in SOCs: A Solution to SOAR's Unfulfilled Promises
description: Security Orchestration, Automation, and Response (SOAR) was introduced with the promise of revolutionizing Security Operations Centers (SOCs) through automation, reducing manual workloads and enhancing efficiency. However, despite three generations of technology and 10 years of advancements, SOAR hasnâ€™t fully delivered on its potential, leaving SOCs still grappling with many of the same
